column2: what I usually order for brunch or lunch is the okonomiyaki
column3: which is sort of like an asian pancake with pork belly and bonito flakes on top. If you're feeling a tad adventurous I'd recommend this! Little Goat is more often packed than not
column5: make reservations ahead of time! When you can't
column6: put your name down and hang out by the bar! I usually stop by for a Sofie while I'm there. Not sure how often they rotate their beers!
